# Data processing

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data <- readxl::read_excel("~/GitHub/project--G4/scripts/nasty.xlsx")

#"~/UNIL 2021/Programming_tools/project--G4/scripts/nasty.xlsx"

data$Measure3 <- as.double(data$Measure3)

data$Measure5 <- as.double(data$Measure5)
data$Measure6 <- as.double(data$Measure6)
data$Tare <- as.double(data$Tare)
data$Target.Value <- as.double(data$Target.Value)
data_try<- data
```
